sentences.en: Finally, two hardware decouple Methods : Were compared on their merit and fault.
sentences.cn: 最后对比了两种硬件消耦的优缺点.

sentences.en: In heterogeneous and dynamic environments we must decouple the event producers and consumers.
sentences.cn: 在多样和动态的环境,我们必须解偶事件的生产者和消费者.

sentences.en: It'showed that eccentric pressure is produced by eccentric decouple charge blasting on borehole wall.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,偏心不耦合装药在孔壁上形成明显的偏心应力场.

sentences.en: The four point suspension strategies are analyzed, which are mechanical decouple andelectrical decouple.
sentences.cn: 分析和探讨了四点悬浮的实现策略:机械解耦和电气解耦.

sentences.en: The inner loop adopts sliding mode control which can decouple torque and flux.
sentences.cn: 内环采用滑动模控制实现了电动机转矩和磁通的解耦.

trans.tran_cn: 减弱（核爆炸）震波，分离，隔断
